section.title: Overview
section.para: PDP performs host-based authorization of the client, i.e expects the client to be running with host credential. If that fails, then a self authorization is done, i.e the client is expected to have same credential as server.

listitem.para: Property url should be configured with the URL of the client.
Property service can be configured with the service,, if service credentials are used rather than regular host credentials. By default the value is set to host.

row.entry: Peer DN does not match both the expected host DN and the server's credentials.
Peer DN matches expected host DN or matches the server's credentials.

section.title: Related interceptors
section.para: No interceptors are related other than the default bootstrap interceptor (), which is required to be used with this PDP.
